faqs.question: What is the difference between carpet area and super built-up area in a Manav Chowk flat
faqs.answer: The carpet area is the actual usable floor space within the walls of your flat the area where you can literally lay carpet excluding the thickness of the inner walls. The super built-up area includes the carpet area plus a proportional share of common areas like lobbies stairs and amenities. It is vital to understand this difference when calculating the true value and usable space of a Flat For Sale in Manav Chowk.

faqs.question: What is the current trend regarding property taxes in the Manav Chowk area
